In a meeting with representatives of the CONIC we discussed the reduction of agrarian debt that will benefit thousands of Guatemalans.
Out of a total of Q225 million debt found at the beginning of our administration, it has been reduced by Q165 million.
We seek to solve land conflicts and give technical support to families that benefit from the agreements.

Press Conference on the launch of # Mons2015, European Capital of Culture in 2015 http://t.co/wNbMV5PW9V
'# Mons2015 is 300 projects, 5000 artists including 1500 local artists and 36 theatrical and choreographic creations'
'# Mons2015 is 45 exhibitions and a collaboration with 22 tourist and cultural institutions in Hainaut'
'And a collaboration with 31 cities and municipalities partners in Belgium and abroad' # Mons2015
'# Mons2015, it is also 5 new museums, 2 of which relate to "world heritage of Unesco"
'More than 80% of these events will be free!' # Mons2015
'Our region has had difficult decades since the deindustrialization of the 1970s. # Mons2015 takes us forward!'
'# Mons2015 is above all a territorial project that promotes the economic and social development of our region'
'# Mons2015 is a great opportunity for #Wallonia and for its image abroad'
'Many people never go through the doors of a museum. My ambition is to give a taste for works & creation '# Mons2015
'It is also to break the wall of glass that prevents part of the population from going to the discovery' # Mons2015
'Here is the challenge of the European Capital of Culture: access to the greatest number, pleasure & shared discovery' # Mons2015
You are welcome to # Mons2015! Find the impressive program here http://t.co/UqMDa6hfV3
U bent van harte welkom in # Mons2015! Yesterday vindt u het indrukwekkende program http://t.co/g9Xqr6fz1x

The process of reconstruction of houses and public buildings damaged by the last earthquakes in the country, progresses satisfactorily.
This week we advance more and we will deliver 470 houses in the west of the country to families that were affected by the earthquakes.
Also, 70 public infrastructure works will be inaugurated among schools, health posts and police stations that were totally rebuilt
